description:
Machine Learning is a pathway of many outcomes and not all of them are perfect. It’s time to address both edges of the sword that we aspire to use. In this meetup we will hear Nuno Moniz from FCUP/INESC TEC which will show us the not so pretty side of Machine Learning. Luís Roque, CEO of HUUB will, in turn, tell us the story of the company he has helped to found, and how Machine Learning in this case revealed the positive edge of the sword.
“It’s dangerous to go alone. Take this.” two awesome perspectives on Machine Learning with you.
Curious? 
Agenda:
• 18:30-19:00: Welcome and get together
• 19:00-19:30: Talk 1: Machine Learning is gullible, insecure and inefficient. By Nuno Moniz – FCUP / INESC TEC
• 19:40-19:45: Group photo
• 19:45-20:15: Networking / Coffee Break
• 20:15-20:45: Talk 2: The path to an AI driven company by Luís Roque – CEO & Co-Founder HUUB.
• 20:50: Closing, hanging out and some beers
• 21:00: Dinner is optional, please register at https://doodle.com/poll/cyk3rkqq2f6kh78y
name: DSPT #46 - Machine Learning is a Double Edged Sword
